Question: The show folded after just eight performances, but at age 18, this person was singled out and discovered by the New York Times.
Hints: This person's next film was Belle of the Nineties (1934).
During a 1935 radio broadcast Walter Winchell incorrectly reported that this person had been married to Guido's brother, Pietro.
This person referred to Charlie as "all wood and a yard long" and commented that his kisses gave her splinters.
